Home:Title: Welcome to sentiment analyze
Home:Text:
This tool will help us build a database of sentimental values for different text documents. This is important in order to establish a baseline of how humans consider sentences and text either positive, neutral or negative. By participating in this research you are helping us reaching that goal.

If you choose to participate in this research, you are 100% anonoymous. You can enter your email in order to be part of a lottery that will take part after the research is done. For each text you label you will recieve a ticket and all your tickets goes into a bucket. Once the research is done, we will select on ticket that will be awared an Ipad or Galaxy Tab.
